00054     namespace xml

00059         //Members
00060         Element::Element (ticpp::Element *Meta, bool FirstTimeUsed)
00061         {
00062             this->Wrapped = Meta;
00063             if (FirstTimeUsed)
00064                 { this->TakeOwnerOfWrapped(); }
00065         }
00066 
00067         Element::Element ()
00068         {
00069             this->Wrapped = new ticpp::Element();
00070             this->TakeOwnerOfWrapped();
00071         }
00072 
00073         Element::Element (const std::string &Value)
00074         {
00075             this->Wrapped = new ticpp::Element(Value);
00076             this->TakeOwnerOfWrapped();
00077         }
00078 
00079         Element::Element (const std::string &Value, const std::string &Text)
00080         {
00081             this->Wrapped = new ticpp::Element(Value, Text);
00082             this->TakeOwnerOfWrapped();
00083         }
00084 
00085         Element::~Element()
00086             {}
00087 
00088         Element* Element::GetPointerFromWrapped(ticpp::Element* Meta)
00089         {
00090             Element* Other;
00091             try {
00092                 //Most likely cause of failure is ticpp::Node::GetBasePointer() returns 0
00093                 Other = static_cast<Element*>( Meta->GetBasePointer()->GetUserData() );
00094             } catch (ticpp::Exception e) {
00095                 std::stringstream temp;
00096                 temp << "Could not Create phys::xml::Element from invalid pointer." << std::endl << e.what() << std::endl << "Details: " << e.m_details;
00097                 throw Exception (temp.str());
00098             }
00099 
00100             //If there is no pointer inside TinyXML to our node, then it doesn't exist, so make it Otherwise use what is there
00101             if(0 == Other)
00102                 { Other = new Element(Meta, true); }
00103             return Other;
00104         }
00105 
00106         Base::XMLComponentType Element::GetType() const
00107             { return Base::isElement; }
00108 
00109         std::istream& Element::operator>> (std::istream &In)
00110             { return In >> *(static_cast <ticpp::Element*>(this->Wrapped)); }
00111 
00112         std::ostream& Element::operator<< (std::ostream &Out)
00113             { return Out << *(static_cast <ticpp::Element*>(this->Wrapped)); }
00114 
00115         Attribute* Element::FirstAttribute() const
00116             { return Attribute::GetPointerFromWrapped( static_cast<ticpp::Element*>(this->Wrapped)->FirstAttribute(true) ); }
00117 
00118         Attribute* Element::LastAttribute() const
00119             { return Attribute::GetPointerFromWrapped(static_cast<ticpp::Element*>(this->Wrapped)->LastAttribute(true) ); }
